name: Nicole MACK, Respondent, v. John M. FONTAINE, M.D. and Bruce Bowers, M.D., Michael Frost, M.D. and Medical College of Pennsylvania Hospital. Petition of Bruce Bowers, M.D., Michael Frost, M.D. and Medical College of Pennsylvania Hospital

parties: Nicole MACK, Respondent, v. John M. FONTAINE, M.D. and Bruce Bowers, M.D., Michael Frost, M.D. and Medical College of Pennsylvania Hospital. Petition of Bruce Bowers, M.D., Michael Frost, M.D. and Medical College of Pennsylvania Hospital.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 4th day of February, 2008, as the matter filed at June Term, 2004 No. 8596 in the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is discontinued, the Petition for Review and/or Allowance of Appeal and Application for Stay are DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
941 A.2d 1258
Nicole MACK, Respondent, v. John M. FONTAINE, M.D. and Bruce Bowers, M.D., Michael Frost, M.D. and Medical College of Pennsylvania Hospital. Petition of Bruce Bowers, M.D., Michael Frost, M.D. and Medical College of Pennsylvania Hospital.
No. 6 EM 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 4, 2008.
